name: Crime Gold
description: CrimeCash is a retro crime themed, text based strategy game. We have taken inspiration from extremely successful traditional crime games and brought not only the innovative concept to blockchain , but also implemented it successfully in a way that is extremely addictive for both blockchain and traditional gamers. The objective of the game is to rule CrimeWorld as the ultimate criminal mastermind, ruthless enough to become the strongest, richest, or most influential criminal. To win players need to accumulate Most Power: Buying Attack / Defense weapon nfts or in-store assets to increase your total power Most Cash: Accumulating the most cash by looting other criminals Most Referrals : growing your gamg by bringing in more criminals Every game round is of 30 days and 1000 new CrimeGold are created after each round to be distributed to the winners of the Weekly Leaderboard and Monthly Leaderboard and players with certain special achievements The game is already live on the Fantom blockchain and within its first week has seen over 75k+ transactions on the chain from over 2k+ gamers
